cdt_tasks.name: primary task with fail pre task
cdt_tasks.command: echo primary task with fail pre task | tee -a ${OUTPUT_FILE}

cdt_tasks.name: primary task with links
cdt_tasks.command: echo /a/b/c:10 && echo some random data && echo /d/e/f:15:32 something

cdt_tasks.name: fail primary task with links
cdt_tasks.command: echo /a/b/c:10 && echo some random data && echo /d/e/f:15:32 something && exit 32

cdt_tasks.name: primary task with fail pre task with links
